logGroupName.name: Log group name
logGroupName.description: The name of the log group.

kmsKeyId.name: KMS Key
kmsKeyId.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CMK to use when encrypting log data. For more information, see Amazon Resource Names - Key Management Service.

tags.name: Resource Tags
tags.description: The key-value pairs to use for the tags. CloudWatch Logs doesnâ€™t support IAM policies that prevent users from assigning specified tags to log groups using the aws:Resource/key-name  or aws:TagKeys condition keys. For more information about using tags to control access, see Controlling access to Amazon Web Services resources using tags.
